doc.field: SIR 20 from Palembang traded for April shipment at 34-1/2 cents a lb and 34-5/8 cents a lb, FOB, sight, brokers said. SIR 20 from Padang traded for April shipment at 34-5/8 cents a lb, FOB, sight, brokers said. Belawan SIR 20 was offered but unsold for April shipment at 35 cents a lb, they said. Reuter
